Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are being developed for a wide variety of applications because of their high efficiency over a wide range of power levels.
Titulo: Demonstration of a highly efficient solid oxide fuel cell power system using adiabatic steam reforming and anode gas recirculation

Sentencas: Applications for SOFCs include 1-2 kW residential combined heat and power applications, 100-250 kW systems for distributed generation and grid extension, and megawatt-scale power plants utilizing coal.
Titulo: Demonstration of a highly efficient solid oxide fuel cell power system using adiabatic steam reforming and anode gas recirculation

Sentencas: This paper reports on the development of a highly efficient, small-scale SOFC power system operating on methane.
Titulo: Demonstration of a highly efficient solid oxide fuel cell power system using adiabatic steam reforming and anode gas recirculation

Sentencas: The system uses adiabatic steam reforming of methane and anode gas recirculation to achieve high net electrical efficiency.
Titulo: Demonstration of a highly efficient solid oxide fuel cell power system using adiabatic steam reforming and anode gas recirculation

Sentencas: The heat and water required for the endothermic reforming reaction are provided by the recirculated anode gas emerging from the SOFC stack.
Titulo: Demonstration of a highly efficient solid oxide fuel cell power system using adiabatic steam reforming and anode gas recirculation

Sentencas: Although the single-pass fuel utilization is only about 55%, because of the anode gas recirculation the overall fuel utilization is up to 93%.
Titulo: Demonstration of a highly efficient solid oxide fuel cell power system using adiabatic steam reforming and anode gas recirculation

Sentencas: The demonstrated system achieved net power output of 1650-2150W with a maximum net LHV efficiency of 0.566 at 1720W. Overall system efficiency could be further improved to over 0.60 with use of properly sized blowers.
Titulo: Demonstration of a highly efficient solid oxide fuel cell power system using adiabatic steam reforming and anode gas recirculation
Demonstration of a highly efficient solid oxide fuel cell power system using adiabatic steam reforming and anode gas recirculation
Demonstration of a highly efficient solid oxide fuel cell power system using adiabatic steam reforming and anode gas recirculation
